00025 if (isset($_GET['inXML']) AND !empty($_GET['inXML'])) {
00026     if (!$sysconf['enable_xml_detail']) {
00027         die('XML Detail is disabled');
00028     }
00029     // filter the ID
00030     $detail_id = intval($_GET['id']);
00031     // include detail library and template
00032     include 'lib/detail.inc.php';
00033     // create detail object
00034     $detail = new detail($dbs, $detail_id, 'mods');
00035     $output = $detail->showDetail();
00036     // send http header
00037     header('Content-Type: text/xml');
00038     echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>'."\n";
00039     echo $detail->getPrefix();
00040     echo $output;
00041     echo $detail->getSuffix();
00042     exit();
00043 } else {
00044     // filter the ID
00045     $detail_id = intval($_GET['id']);
00046     // include detail library and template
00047     include 'lib/detail.inc.php';
00048     include $sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/detail_template.php';
00049     // create detail object
00050     $detail = new detail($dbs, $detail_id);
00051     $detail->setListTemplate($detail_template);
00052     // set the content for info box
00053     $info = '<strong>'.strtoupper(__('Record Detail')).'</strong><hr />';
00054     if (!defined('LIGHTWEIGHT_MODE')) {
00055         $info .= '<a href="javascript: history.back();">'.__('Back To Previous').'</a> &nbsp;';
00056     }
00057     if ($sysconf['enable_xml_detail'] && !defined('LIGHTWEIGHT_MODE')) {
00058         $info .= '<a href="index.php?p=show_detail&inXML=true&id='.$detail_id.'" class="xmlDetailLink" target="_blank">XML Detail</a>';
00059     }
00060     if (!defined('LIGHTWEIGHT_MODE')) {
00061         // include Prototype javascript library
00062         echo '<script type="text/javascript" src="'.JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'prototype.js"></script>';
00063     }
00064     // output the record detail
00065     echo $detail->showDetail();
00066     $page_title = $detail->record_title;
00067     $metadata = $detail->metadata;
00068     echo '<br />'."\n";
00069 }
